output_data.clarification_question: To select the appropriate combined E/M and psychotherapy code, what was the total time spent with the patient (face-to-face and non-face-to-face clinical time on the date of service)?
output_data.suggested_answer: Was the documented total time 45-50 minutes (suggesting 99214 + 90836) or 55+ minutes (suggesting 99215 + 90838)?

primary_code.description: Established patient evaluation and management, level 4.
primary_code.rationale: The session involved the assessment of worsening symptoms (*fatigue*, *early morning awakening*), monitoring of an existing medication (*Sertraline*), an increase in dosage, and a full safety assessment confirming passive suicidal ideation. This clinical complexity meets the criteria for Moderate Medical Decision Making.

addon_codes.rationale: Significant psychotherapy was performed, focusing on the patient's feelings of failure, guilt, and passive death ideation, documented in conjunction with the medical management service (E/M).

output_data.medical_necessity: Management of *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate (F33.1)*, including pharmacological adjustment and crisis screening/support for passive suicidal ideation.
